topic.title: How enable image in post for my zerotalk forum clone ?
topic.body: It's hardcoded in all.js , ![img](img.jpg) will turned in ![img](img.jpg). Could anyone tell me about enable this markup (image) ? thanks dude

topic.title: How enable image in post for my zerotalk forum clone ?
topic.body: It's hardcoded in all.js , ![img](img.jpg) will turned in ![img](img.jpg). Could anyone tell me about enable this markup (image) ? thanks dude

topic.title: How open external links, in zeroblog clone, in new tab/window ?
topic.body:
hello mates, I find out base target for all link in blogs is _top. Any solution for open external links in new windows ?
thanks

topic.title: How make proxies survive ?
topic.body:
It's a disaster , many proxyes stops working after few days , too much files to fetching.
How about reset the cached file every 24 hours ?
It's frustrating seeing proxy slowdown e die ....

1_1HtGfHk2MuqcB5nYXZ6b2NajXJLoxfq7XS.body:
> [nofish](#comment_976_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj): Search and remove line window.renderer = new Renderer(); from js/all.js (around line 1075)

Many thanks, you're great !

uhmm, do not work correctly, "missing content.json error" appear

what's wrong ?

> [nofish](#comment_978_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj): You have to sign the content of the site using the sidebar after you make any modification in the sourcecode.

do not work, maybe cloning zerotalk as is, is wrong. What about permission in content.json ?

I just tried and it's works finally: http://127.0.0.1:43110/16aToi59EwcSmA8pyEdKjAWFiep3tginsf/?Home

I've cloned your modified clone ;)

Could you put this mod as option in a config file ? Is usefull for me ...

3_1HtGfHk2MuqcB5nYXZ6b2NajXJLoxfq7XS.body:
thanks nofish.
Firefox request permission for pop-up , arghhh !

I tested this here:
http://127.0.0.1:43110/1B7mYTbNeVVKgjUywvpcCbkEmvj7AJYuRr

Any ideas for an easy return back to the blog ? Please, please?

7_1Ho48cxWwRFdDChHksp1fhdPvGmpaiZfcH.body:
I barely understand your need modify file data.json in your forum folder modify the type : post type="group"

>{
"body": "Articles about Bitcoin, Torrent and Peer To Peer networks",
"added": 1436262090,
**"type": "group",**
"topic_id": 1,
"title": "P2P news flow"
},

4_1HtGfHk2MuqcB5nYXZ6b2NajXJLoxfq7XS.body:
uhmmm, delete all sites with a cron job , maybe....

My friend pi2 data storage filling-up slowdown the whole  system. Deleting all files in  data folder every day and the system return fine...

1510499714_18j1DomS5vDgXcKnSGuSmPSDTQjxi.body: It's working or is alpha stage ?
